data.title: Free Live Music at Mountain Brook Vineyards
data.meta_description: Enjoy live music at Mountain Brook Vineyards.♦ Live music 3-6pm July: 7/6 Seth and Sara, 7/7 Yesterday Band, 7/13 Bill & Tad’s Excellent Duo, 7/14 The Jeff Edward Band, 7/20 […]
data.text:
Enjoy live music at Mountain Brook Vineyards.♦

Live music 3-6pm

July: 7/6 Seth and Sara, 7/7 Yesterday Band, 7/13 Bill & Tad’s Excellent Duo, 7/14 The Jeff Edward Band, 7/20 Twin Sons, 7/21 Kayla McKinney, 7/27 Nick Smith, and 7/28 Danny Greyshock.

June: 6/1 Trade Street Union, 6/2 Yesterday Band, 6/8 Bill & Tad’s Excellent Duo, 6/9 Emily with Strings Attached, 6/15 Emily with Strings Attached, 6/16 Kayla McKinney,6/22 The Bradley Bacci Band, 6/23 Danny Greyshock, 6/29 Red Rock Band, and 6/30 Eric Congdon.

May: 5/4 Seth & Sara, 5/5 Yesterday Band, 5/11 Twin Sons, 5/12 Bill & Tad’s Excellent Duo, 5/18 Emily with Strings Attached, 5/25 Emily with Strings Attached, and 5/26 Kayla McKinney

April: 4/6/24 Bill & Tad’s Excellent Duo, 4/7/24 Kayla McKinney, 4/13/24 Seth and Sara, 4/14/24 Yesterday Band, 4/20/24 Trade Street Union, 4/21/24 Danny Greyshock, 4/27/24 Twin Sons, and 4/28/24 Red Rock Band.

Food Truck 12-7pm

Food Trucks: 4/6/24 The Beach Club, 4/7/24 Cousins Maine Lobster, 4/13/24 The Beach Club, 4/20/24 Howdy Y’all, 4/21/24 Travelin’ Dough, 4/27/24 Arepitas on the Go, and 4/28/24 Haus Heidelberg.

May: 5/4 The Beach Club, 5/5 Traveling Dough, 5/11 Carolina Case-a-Dillaz, 5/12 Carolina Catfish, 5/18 Haus Heidelberg, 5/19 Traveling Dough, 5/25 Howdy Y’all, and 5/26 Carolina Case-a-Dillaz

Evenings at the Experience Center: 6-9pm

June: 6/8 Mark Bumgarner, 6/15 Finkelstein Three and 6/22 Spaceport Floozies
